Previous

Paella Night
Event Info
Wednesday
5:00 PM                                                                  - 10:00 PM
Wednesdays just got
delicious
at The Wave Kitchen & Bar!
Join Chef Armando and his culinary team for
Paella Night
, where sizzling pans, bold flavors, and coastal vibes come together for an unforgettable dining experience.
Watch as fresh seafood, savory saffron rice, and vibrant spices come to life in our signature paella—crafted right before your eyes and bursting with flavor in every bite. It’s dinner and a show, all in one mouthwatering meal!
Bring your appetite, your friends, and your love for great food. This is one weekly tradition you’ll want to savor again and again.
Reservations:
772-410-0100

Plan the Perfect Holiday Party in Vero Beach
Host the Holidays with
Coastal Style
Make this season one to remember with a holiday party set on the shores of Vero Beach. From intimate gatherings to lively company celebrations, Costa d’Este Beach Resort & Spa offers the perfect backdrop with oceanfront views, curated menus, and warm hospitality that shines as brightly as the season.
Book by August 31, 2025, and enjoy ½ off your venue fee—plus added savings to make your event sparkle even more.
Start Planning
Offer valid for new holiday event bookings made by August 31, 2025. Discount applies to venue rental fee only and does not include food & beverage minimums, service charges, or taxes. Minimum of 25 guests required to qualify for this promotion. Offer is subject to availability. Blackout dates may apply. Not valid on existing contracts or in combination with other promotions.
Previous
Next
Why Celebrate at Costa d’Este?
Breathtaking oceanfront and indoor venues
Customizable catering menus by our award-winning culinary team
Dedicated on-site event planners
Audiovisual support and setup
Seasonal décor packages available upon request
Planning a larger celebration or inviting out-of-town guests? We make it easy with exclusive group room block options and special “Take the Elevator Home” rates so no one has to cut the night short.
Let our team handle the details while you raise a glass to the season.
Start Planning

Saturday September 6, 2025
10:00 am - 11:00 am
Stretch, sip, and snuggle at Costa d’Este’s
Kitten Yoga
—a playful morning of movement and purrs to support a great cause. Begin with a 30-minute, beginner-friendly yoga session as adoptable kittens from
H.A.L.O. No-Kill
Rescue scamper around you, followed by 30 minutes of cuddle time and bottomless mimosas.
Adoptable kittens on-site with H.A.L.O. reps and foster families
$10 from each ticket donated to H.A.L.O.
Tickets starting at $40 per person
Guests encouraged to bring their own yoga mats (limited extras available)
No glass; please bring water bottles with secure lids
Unwind, do some good, and maybe even meet your new best friend.
Reserve Now

Friday September 19, 2025
6:30 pm - 9:30 pm
Many Moreira | Live at The Wave
Manny Moreira is a Brazilian American, Juilliard-trained conductor, guitarist, vocalist, composer, and producer. He has performed worldwide, including as a U.S. State Department Latin Jazz Ambassador. A veteran of national tours and four Tony Award–winning Broadway shows, he was the original guitarist for
In The Heights
on Broadway. He has appeared at Lincoln Center, the Kennedy Center, and with Tony winner Paulo Szot. His recordings include
In The Heights
,
Paraiso
with Gerry Mulligan, and the 2023 Downbeat Critics Award–winning
Savoy
with Taj Mahal.

Many Moreira | Live at The Wave
Manny Moreira is a Brazilian American, Juilliard-trained conductor, guitarist, vocalist, composer, and producer. He has performed worldwide, including as a U.S. State Department Latin Jazz Ambassador. A veteran of national tours and four Tony Award–winning Broadway shows, he was the original guitarist for
In The Heights
on Broadway. He has appeared at Lincoln Center, the Kennedy Center, and with Tony winner Paulo Szot. His recordings include
In The Heights
,
Paraiso
with Gerry Mulligan, and the 2023 Downbeat Critics Award–winning
Savoy
with Taj Mahal.

Signature Events in VERO BEACH
Experience the vibrant rhythm of Vero Beach through Costa d’Este’s signature events. From chef-driven culinary nights and beachfront live music to festive seasonal celebrations, our oceanfront resort is the place to be. Discover unforgettable moments made for locals and guests alike.
Don’t miss a beat—bookmark this page for the latest happenings at Costa.
Next Up at Costa

Paws & Pose:
Kitten Yoga
September 6, 2025 | 10:00 AM – 11:00 AM
Stretch, sip, and snuggle at this playful morning of movement and mimosas—paired with adoptable kittens from H.A.L.O. No-Kill Rescue. Enjoy beginner-friendly yoga, cuddle time, and bottomless brunch vibes, all for a great cause.
Feel good, do good, and maybe meet your future furry companion.
MORE INFO
